main event: An observer reported seeing a single extremely bright red object in the sky over Dixon, Illinois on July 3, 1966.
interesting points: The object changed direction and exhibited a zig-zag motion,The front section of the object resembled a truncated cone that appeared to be on fire,The object was visible for approximately 18 seconds,The observation was made at night under clear sky conditions,The observer offered to take a lie detector test to confirm their account.
sighted object: a bright red object resembling a truncated cone
